resources.string:
This is your character! You can make him run around and the goal is to attack ghosts and collect coins. 
 
 This is a ghost. You should do your best to avoid them until you are able to destroy them. There are special items you can use to eviscerate these floating fiends! 
 
 These are the special items that you can use to takedown the ghosts. Just run your character over them to pick them up. 
 
 Picking up coins will help you to increase your score.
Brought to you by Ryan, Julian, Alex, Zakey, and Davy.
University of Virginia CS 2110 Fall Semester
